scripts.gh-pages: shx mkdir -p gh-pages/components/dom-deque && shx cp -R bower_components/* gh-pages/components && shx ls *.{html,js} | xargs cp -t gh-pages/components/dom-deque && shx cp -R demo gh-pages/components/dom-deque && shx echo '<meta http-equiv=refresh content="0;URL=components/dom-deque/">' > gh-pages/index.html && shx chmod +x node_modules/git-directory-deploy/deploy.sh
scripts.postgh-pages: GIT_DEPLOY_DIR=gh-pages GIT_DEPLOY_BRANCH=gh-pages node_modules/git-directory-deploy/deploy.sh -m 'Deploy gh-pages'; shx rm -rf gh-pages
